column4: wut up ubuntu world, i've decided to do a fresh install of 7.04 but i want to keep all my /home settings currently on my buggy 7.10 upgrade.  Will anyone tell me the best way to go about this?  I would google but it's kind of a complicated question imo.

wut up ubuntu world, i've decided to do a fresh install of 7.04 but i want to keep all my /home settings currently on my buggy 7.10 upgrade.  Will anyone tell me the best way to go about this?  I'm thinking transfer the home directory to another partition maybe? will i be able to point the formatter to the /home partition without overwriting it?  any help please?
